summary.description: > CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'MetaBAT' | an adaptive binning algorithm for robust and efficient genome reconstruction from metagenome assemblies | MetaBAT2 clusters metagenomic contigs into different "bins", each of which should correspond to a putative genome | MetaBAT2 uses nucleotide composition information and source strain abundance (measured by depth-of-coverage by aligning the reads to the contigs) to perform binning
summary.name: MetaBAT 2
